description: The chosen components align with the "Code analysis and documentation generation tool with IDE and CI/CD integrations" project type by representing a clear pipeline for transforming raw code into architectural insights.

components.name: Graph Node Manager
components.description: Defines and manages the fundamental units (nodes) of the code graph. It handles node properties such as type (callable, class, data) and basic operations like adding edges to a node.

components.name: Graph Edge Manager
components.description: Manages the connections (edges) between nodes in the code graph. It provides functionalities for creating, representing, and querying the source and destination of edges.

components.name: Call Graph Builder
components.description: Constructs and maintains the overall call graph of the codebase. It allows for the addition of nodes and edges, filtering of the graph based on files, and initiates the clustering process.

components.name: Adaptive Clustering Algorithm
components.description: Implements the core algorithms for adaptively clustering graph nodes. This includes creating abstracted graph representations and evaluating the quality of the clustering.

components.name: Clustering Result Store
components.description: Stores and provides query capabilities for the results generated by the graph clustering process. It allows retrieval of cluster IDs, files associated with clusters, and nodes within specific clusters.

components.name: Clustering Orchestrator
components.description: Orchestrates the entire graph clustering process, including initiating the adaptive clustering and generating various string representations of the clustered graph for output.
